comments.creator: aaw1990@hotmail.com
comments.author: aaw1990@hotmail.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 566504
no-addon.jpg

User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.202 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I installed a bug finder add-on called BugDigger on Firefox. 


Actual results:

It is said that I've already installed the add-on, but no such icon appears in my browser like what the instructions said.


Expected results:

An icon of BugDigger add-on appears next to the Google search box.
comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0) AppleWebKit/535.1 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/14.0.835.202 Safari/535.1

Steps to reproduce:

I installed a bug finder add-on called BugDigger on Firefox. 


Actual results:

It is said that I've already installed the add-on, but no such icon appears in my browser like what the instructions said.


Expected results:

An icon of BugDigger add-on appears next to the Google search box.

comments.author: acelists@atlas.sk
comments.creator: acelists@atlas.sk
comments.text: Try to right-clicking on the toolbar and select Customize. Maybe the icon is only in the opened dialog with icons you need to drag where you wish.
comments.raw_text: Try to right-clicking on the toolbar and select Customize. Maybe the icon is only in the opened dialog with icons you need to drag where you wish.

comments.text: Also see in Tools->Addons->Extensions where the addon is and if it is enabled and if it has any Options.
comments.raw_text: Also see in Tools->Addons->Extensions where the addon is and if it is enabled and if it has any Options.
comments.creator: acelists@atlas.sk
comments.author: acelists@atlas.sk
jasonspiro4@gmail.com
comments.creator: jasonspiro4@gmail.com
comments.text:
Hi Audrey,

Please visit http://bugdigger.com/browser-add-on/download/ again.  At the bottom of that page, there's a tech support email address.  Please email them and tell them about the problem you had.  Please report back to us about whether they replied or not, whether or not the problem was fixed, and what the resolution was.

Kind regards,
--Jason
comments.raw_text:
Hi Audrey,
